name: BEAN(PC prototype)
description:
Changes in versoin 2.1

  • Reworked the Sandbox (Big version) map. The small version of the map is the same
  • New gun: Uzi
  • Hit and damaged notification
  • Changed Pistol stats: 
    • Changed damage from 10 to 15
    • Added one more clip
  • Changed Shotgun stats:
    • Changed pallet count from 12 to 11

Bug fixes

  • Fixed a bug where the scope overlay is active if the match isn't started
  • Fixed a bug where your nametag text doesn't correspond with your name
  • Fixed a bug where player cards in the leaderboard weren't deleted after the player left the room
  • Fixed the aim transition speed
